N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 26.3 - Procedures for issuance

State Regulations
(a) Where to apply. The original issuance of
van pool plates will be restricted to the designated motor vehicle offices. A
set of van pool plates will be issued for each vehicle. The plates are embossed
"van pool" on the bottom of the plate. All renewal registration transactions
for van pool vehicles may be presented at any motor vehicle issuing
office. (b) Required fees and
documents. (1)

Application. Each person
applying for van pool plates shall submit an application in the form and manner
prescribed by the commissioner together with the appropriate fee and
certification as set forth in paragraph (4) of this subdivision. (2)

Fee. Vehicles which qualify for van pool
plates will be registered at a fee that is the same as the registration fee for
passenger vehicles and any motor vehicle use tax prescribed by law will be
applied where appropriate. (3)

Insurance certification. Each applicant for van pool plates shall present the
appropriate FS insurance identification card. (4)

Certification requirements. Each
applicant for an original van pool registration shall certify to the following: (i) the vehicle is to be used in a van pool
operation as defined in section
26.2
(a) of this

Part; (ii)
the vehicle meets the
vehicle size requirements as defined in section
26.2
(b) of this

Part; (iii)
the vehicle does not
operate under any authority of the New York City Taxi and Limousine Commission
and/or under any certificate or permit issued by the Department of

Transportation pursuant to section
26.2
(c) of this

Part; (iv)
the route and geographic
areas involved in the van pool operation, as well as the name, address and
pickup location of the regular van pool passenger location of work place. The
employer's name, address and building number must be included, as well as, the
names of the regularly travelled highways and arterials; (v) the approximate one-way trip mileage; and
(vi)
the approximate times of
first passenger pickup, arrival at the work place, departure from the work
place and last passenger discharge. Notes
